field.label: Authors
field.hint: Enter the names of the authors of this item below.

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Other Titles
field.hint: If the item has any alternative titles, please enter them below.

field.label: Date of Issue
field.hint: Please give the date of previous publication or public distribution below. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: Enter the name of the publisher of the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Citation
field.hint: Enter the standard citation for the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Series/Report No.
field.hint: Enter the series and number assigned to this item by your community.

field.label: Identifiers
field.hint: If the item has any identification numbers or codes associated with it, please enter the types and the actual numbers or codes below.

field.label: Type
field.hint: Select the type(s) of content of the item. To select more than one value in the list, you may have to hold down the "CTRL" or "Shift" key.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list below, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select 'N/A'.

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Enter appropriate subject keywords or phrases below.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter the abstract of the item below.

field.label: Sponsors
field.hint: Enter the names of any sponsors and/or funding codes in the box below.

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter any other description or comments in this box.

field.label: One: Authors
field.hint: Enter the names of the authors of this item below.

field.label: Title
field.hint: The name given to the resource.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Other Titles
field.hint: Alternative title for the item, such as a translated or abbreviated form of the title.

field.label: Author
field.hint: An entity primarily responsible for making the content of the resource.

field.label: Contributor
field.hint: An entity responsible for making contributions to the content of the resource.

field.label: Date of Issue
field.hint: The date the resource was published or issued.
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: The topic of the content of the resource.

field.label: Description
field.hint: An account of the content of the resource.

field.label: Source
field.hint: A reference to a resource from which the present resource is derived.

field.label: Media Type
field.hint: Used to more accurately describe and qualify the type of material in the collection. The following entries for "Media Type" are strongly encouraged: Newspapers, Books, Images, Maps, Manuscripts, Pamphlets, Objects, Film, Audio, Document

field.label: SC Region
field.hint: If relevant, supply South Carolina regional information to reflect the geographical content of the material. Regions used by SCDL include Upstate, Midlands, Low Country, and Pee Dee.

field.label: SC County
field.hint: If relevant, supply South Carolina County information to reflect the geographical content of the material.

field.label: Digitization Specifications
field.hint: When the information is available, include: bit depth, resolution, scanner hardware and software used, and archival master file type (i.e.: TIFF)

field.label: Type
field.hint: The nature or genre of the content of the resource.

field.label: Notes
field.hint: Additional information about the resource for an external audience.

field.label: Plot ID
field.hint: Project accession number for each record
field.required: You must enter a Plot ID for this item.

field.label: Full Name
field.hint: Full name of person. Example, John C. Smith
field.required: You must enter a Full name for this item.

field.label: Last name
field.hint: Last name or initial

field.label: First name
field.hint: First name or initial

field.label: Middle name
field.hint: Middle name or initial

field.label: Birth day
field.hint: Birthday including day and month if available

field.label: Death date
field.hint: Date of death including day and month if available

field.label: Age
field.hint: Age if it is provided on the tombstone

field.label: Transcript
field.hint: Transcription of the tombstone and footstone if available

field.label: Special attribute
field.hint: Special attributes of the person or tombstone

field.label: Other name
field.hint: Other name that is listed on the tombstone

field.label: Notes
field.hint: Other notes about the record

pair.displayed-value: 300ppi, Epson Expression 10000xl flatbed scanner with Adobe Acrobat X Standard software, Archival Master file is a multi-image TIFF; online version is a PDF/A-1b. Color depth varies by collection: 24-bit color, 8-bit grayscale, or black & white.
pair.stored-value: 300ppi, Epson Expression 10000xl flatbed scanner with Adobe Acrobat X Standard software, Archival Master file is a multi-image TIFF; online version is a PDF/A-1b. Color depth varies by collection: 24-bit color, 8-bit grayscale, or black & white.

pair.displayed-value: 300ppi, Bookeye 3 scanner with OPUS FreeFlow software, Archival Master file is a multi-image TIFF; online version is a PDF/A-1b. Color depth varies by collection: 24-bit color, 8-bit grayscale, or black & white.
pair.stored-value: 300ppi, Bookeye 3 scanner with OPUS FreeFlow software, Archival Master file is a multi-image TIFF; online version is a PDF/A-1b. Color depth varies by collection: 24-bit color, 8-bit grayscale, or black & white.
